name: RDBMS
description: Learn relational database management systems, including SQL and database design concepts.

name: Frontend Development
description: Master HTML, CSS, and JavaScript to build beautiful websites and responsive UIs.

name: C# Programming
description: Understand the C# programming language, covering basic syntax, object-oriented programming, and .NET framework.

name: Basic Python
description: Learn Python programming from scratch, covering syntax, data structures, and basic scripting.

name: Manual Testing Basics
description: Understand the fundamentals of manual software testing, covering test case writing and defect management.

name: Testing Basic Concepts and Automation
description: Comprehensive course covering testing fundamentals, manual testing, and automation with Selenium and Playwright.

name: Advanced Testing Automation
description: Learn advanced test automation techniques and frameworks for efficient testing automation.

name: Full Stack Testing
description: Complete testing suite covering basics, manual testing, automation with Selenium/Playwright, and advanced frameworks.

name: Python Full Stack
description: Become a proficient full-stack developer using Python, covering Django, RESTful APIs, and front-end integration.

name: Dotnet Core Full Stack
description: Master full-stack development using .NET Core, covering front-end, back-end, and database integration.
